committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize community-wide public services as eligible community developments activities.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to make communitywide public services eligible for assistance as community development activities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize community-wide public services as eligible community developments activities.
